description: Make this white chocolate Basque cheesecake which has a lovely caramelised crust. Plus, learn how to macerate berries, they're perfect with this cake.
keywords: White Chocolate Basque Cheesecake With Berries
name: White Chocolate Basque Cheesecake With Berries Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove and discard baking paper from cheesecake. Transfer to a serving plate. Serve with macerated berries, extra berries and caramilk.
